# =====================================================
# Python cache files (never commit compiled Python files)
# =====================================================
__pycache__/
*.py[cod]
*$py.class


# =====================================================
# Jupyter Notebook checkpoint files
# These are auto-generated backup files created by Jupyter.
# They SHOULD NEVER be committed to Git.
# =====================================================
.ipynb_checkpoints/
*/.ipynb_checkpoints/
*.nbconvert.ipynb


# =====================================================
# Virtual environments (local environments only)
# =====================================================
venv/
env/
ENV/
.venv/
.env/


# =====================================================
# IDE / Editor specific files
# =====================================================
.vscode/
.idea/
*.swp
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db
desktop.ini


# =====================================================
# Logs & debugging files
# =====================================================
*.log
*.tmp
*.bak
*.out


# =====================================================
# Build / Distribution directories
# =====================================================
build/
dist/
*.egg-info/
.eggs/


# =====================================================
# Datasets (large files â€“ keep locally, not in Git)
# =====================================================
*.csv
*.tsv
*.xls
*.xlsx
*.json
*.xml
*.parquet
*.feather
*.h5
*.hdf5
*.pkl
*.pickle
*.sav


# =====================================================
# Machine Learning / Model files (large binary files)
# =====================================================
*.pth
*.pt
*.joblib
*.model
*.ckpt
*.pb
*.onnx


# =====================================================
# Output & generated result folders
# These are reproducible and should not be tracked
# =====================================================
outputs/
results/
reports/
plots/
images/
figures/
logs/


# =====================================================
# Temporary & cache directories
# =====================================================
.cache/
temp/
tmp/
data/tmp/
data/cache/


# =====================================================
# Configuration / secret files (DO NOT COMMIT)
# =====================================================
*.env
.env.*
config.json
secrets.json
credentials.json
token.json
apikey.txt


# =====================================================
# Large project folders (raw data, models, artifacts)
# =====================================================
data/
datasets/
models/
checkpoints/
artifacts/
